author: Jesse Pound
title: JPMorgan's market guru gives his latest forecast after calling the bottom
description: JPMorgan strategist Marko Kolanovic, who called for markets to rebound in late March, joined "Fast Money" to discuss what's next for stocks.
content:
(This story is for CNBC Pro subscribers only). 
JPMorgan strategist Marko Kolanovic said Wednesday on "Fast Money" that he thinks the next few weeks will see a limited re-opening of the United States economy and another move higher for stocks.
